Fuego Peligro

Fuego Peligro is an Android mobile video game and application created for the purpose of informing ages 5 to 15, from elementary to senior high school of the hazards, prevention and safety tips about fire and fire-based accidents.

Created by Team Delta, a final research group from the course Information Technology in De La Salle University - Dasmari√±as using Android Studio with LibGDX game development libraries for game development.
